div.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, Nov. 29, 1929. THIS AND THAT(Editorial.)

body.p: Attendance at recent meetings of the Slovak Catholic Federation has shown an increase; a lively interest manifests itself. This is what is needed! If the Federation will actively engage in some worth-while-project, the remaining few lodges of the Catholic Slovak Union, who, through lack of initiative and co-operation of their officers have failed to join, will, in the near future, come into our fold.
